alert.note: Alert for Defiance; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 12:01PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Putnam, southeastern Defiance, southeastern Paulding, southeastern Henry and northeastern Van Wert Counties through 1230 PM EDT... At 1200 PM EDT, emergency management reported a strong thunderstorm producing a landspout 9 miles northwest of Ottoville, or 9 miles northeast of Van Wert, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Ottoville around 1205 PM EDT. Kalida and Continental around 1215 PM EDT. Glandorf around 1220 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Leipsic, Deshler and Holgate. LANDSPOUT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Defiance; Henry; Paulding; Putnam; Van Wert
